ProductInfo.Features:
The black cable is made of pure copper and of good quality
Can be used with Closed Circuit Television (CCTV) applications and security camera components
Transmit audio video signals and supplies DC power for CCTV security cameras
BNC video, RCA audio & 2.1mm power connectors. Plug and play ready, easy to install
Package includes: 2 of 50ft and 2 of 100ft video audio power cables with bonus BNC RCA connectors
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 2x 50ft and 2x 100ft CCTV DVR Home Surveillance Security Camera Cables Video Audio Power Wires Cords with Bonus BNC RCA Connectors CLG
